pages.title: Invoker
pages.text: Level: <level_t4>$(br2)Spawns in $(copy:Woodland Mansion)Woodland Mansion$()[$(copy:minecraft:mansion)minecraft:mansion$()].$(br)Locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() with $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().$(br2)Defeating $(key)Invoker$() drops $(key)Primal Essence$(), which can be used to craft $(boss/t3/returning_knight)Lost Soul$().
